title: Save output to clipboard — clip
code: library(tidyverse,quietly = TRUE,warn.conflicts = FALSE,verbose = FALSE) #> ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.0     ✔ purrr   1.0.1 #> ✔ tibble  3.2.1     ✔ dplyr   1.1.2 #> ✔ tidyr   1.3.0     ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ readr   2.1.4     ✔ forcats 0.5.1 #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag() summary(glm(case ~ spontaneous+induced,data = infert,family = binomial()))%>%clip()

what: Threshold for the knockoff filter — knockoff.threshold
title: Threshold for the knockoff filter — knockoff.threshold
Threshold for the knockoff filter — knockoff.threshold
Threshold for the knockoff filter — knockoff.threshold
text: W test statistics fdr target false discovery rate (default: 0.1) offset either 0 1 (default: 1). offset used compute rejection threshold statistics. value 1 yields slightly conservative procedure ("knockoffs+") controls FDR according usual definition, offset 0 controls modified FDR.

title: Threshold for the knockoff filter — knockoff.threshold
